abstract: DealBook Online; British government reduces its stake in Lloyds Banking Group to just below 20 percent, part of trading plan aimed at ending its ownership of Lloyds and the Royal Bank of Scotland.
lead_paragraph: The latest sale, part of a trading plan that will run through June, continues efforts to end state ownership of the lender after a bailout.

headline.main: British Government Cuts Lloyds Stake to Below 20%

snippet: The latest sale, part of a trading plan that will run through June, continues efforts to end state ownership of the lender after a bailout.
